name: Ney Matogrosso
description: '''Ney de Souza Pereira''' (born 1 August 1941), known professionally as '''Ney Matogrosso''' ({{IPA|pt|ˈnej ˌmatuˈɡɾosu}}), is a Brazilian singer who is distinguished for his uncommon [[countertenor]] voice. He was ranked by ''[[Rolling Stone]]'' as the third greatest Latin American singer of all time.
